name: towako
normalized: wha-?!
towako immediately freezes up.
her expression stiffens and beads ofsweat appear on her forehead.

name: towako
normalized: re-reika will probably not care about this!

name: kondo
normalized: "call me if you get bullied for no reason", she said.
just you waitand see!
kondo takes out a mobile phone and a memo from his inner pocket andshows them to towako.

name: towako
normalized: wh-!
where did you get this number?!
the girl's voice trembles in surprise: the handwriting definitelybelongs to reika.

name: kondo
normalized: heh, who cares?
all it matters is that i have this number!

name: towako
normalized: are you serious?!

name: kondo
normalized: oh, tow-wy?
do you think rei-chi will be mad when she hears how youtreated me and my guys just because you were in a bad mood?

name: towako
normalized: grr.
the girl groans, unable to even object.

name: kondo
normalized: let's just call her and find out.
i'll say little tow-wy was bullyingus.

name: towako
normalized: don't you mafia have any pride?!
towako's shoulders drop when she sees kondo dialing a number.

name: towako
normalized: aww, fine!
fine!
what do you want?
name your price!

name: kondo
normalized: a da-date!

name: towako
normalized: say what?!
the girl shouts in surprise.

name: kondo
normalized: a date!
please date me for finding out yuyami's whereabouts!

name: towako
normalized: say what?
date!?

name: towako
normalized: a date like that kind of date?
where a man and a woman flirt and goto the movies, eat rice and that kind of junk?
towako is still puzzled.
this was the first time she was asked out ona date since junior high school.

name: kondo
normalized: that's the one.
with me.
kondo nods enthusiastically.

name: towako
normalized: fine by me…but just holding hands with issy?
are you sure that'sall you want?

name: kondo
normalized: yep, no other payment is neccessary.

name: towako
normalized: huh, what's up with that…
such a wish is unbefitting a mafia boss.
more like something a teenagerwould ask for.

name: towako
normalized: tch, fine.
a date it is, then!
she replies with a tinge of embarrassment.

name: kondo
normalized: hahaha.
i promise i'll protect little towako♪
looking at kondo's cheerful face, the girl cannot help but sigh.

name: towako
normalized: yes, yes.
now start working on my request.
just as towako is about to leave, kondo stops her.

name: kondo
normalized: yo, hold on, tow-wy.
i still need to tell you something.

name: towako
normalized: what now?

name: kondo
normalized: umm, "dinner is getting cold, so please hurry up and get back home,milady".
kondo reads out loud the mail he just received and towako freaks out.

name: towako
normalized: ho-ho-how did she know i was here?!

name: kondo
normalized: "butler's intuition", it says.

name: towako
normalized: did she forsee even that?!

name: kondo
normalized: so typical of reika.
you'd better hurry home if you don't want to bescolded, towako.

name: towako
normalized: z-zip it!
i can go on a rampage without my butler's permission!
despite the retort, it looks like all strength drained from her body.
no longer was she the same brave person who tore down the place.

name: kondo
normalized: hehe, the mafia could use a defence mechanism like reika.
especiallyif you are our opponent.

name: towako
normalized: tsk!
dang!

name: kondo
normalized: pass my thanks to rei-chi!

name: towako
normalized: aw, zip it already, ya fool!
towako leaves the mafia hideout with the tail between her legs.
